post:
# Plans

- CPU **1 vCore**
- RAM **512 MiB**
- Storage **10 GiB SSD**
- Data Transfer **320 GiB** (only egress are metered)
- Bandwidth **1Gbps**
- IPv4 **1 x /32**
- IPv6 **1 x /64**

Order links:
- [42 USD / yr](https://www.zeptovm.com/clientarea/cart.php?a=add&pid=56&billingcycle=annually&promocode=7GKIVTH96G)

Coupon: `7GKIVTH96G` (valid for first 30 customers)

Higher plans can be found on our [website](https://www.zeptovm.com/clientarea/cart.php?gid=3) or request via ticket.

# Features

- Genuine HPE Servers
- Pure SSD storage with HW RAID-10
- BGP Session Available ($15 NRC per account, can be waived if paid annually)
- Native IPv6 Support, Free /64 (manual set-up required)

# Datacenter & Network

Datacenter: [Redcom Khabarovsk](https://b2b.redcom.ru/)

Uplink: AS199524 G-Core (Rostelecom, TTK, Megafon and MTS)

Looking Glass: http://ru-khv01.lg.zeptovm.com/
Test IPv4: 185.209.84.233 
Test IPv6: 2a0b:4342:4000:233::
